alert.note: Alert for Beaverhead, Lemhi Highlands; Big Hole Mountains; Centennial Mountains, Island Park (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued October 21 at 2:05PM MDT until October 23 at 12:00PM MDT by NWS Pocatello
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT TONIGHT TO NOON MDT SUNDAY ABOVE 7000 FEET... * WHAT...Snow, heavy at times above 7000 feet. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 6 inches below 7000 feet, except 8 to 14 inches above 7000 feet and across ridge tops and passes. Winds could gust as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...Island Park, Centennial Mountains, and Big Hole Mountains including Monida Pass, Targhee Pass, and Pine Creek Pass. * WHEN...From midnight tonight to noon MDT Sunday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be difficult at times with areas of blowing snow across mountain passes. * ADDITIONAL IMPACTS...Backcountry enthusiasts and hunters should be prepared for wintry conditions and the potential for hypothermia if caught in a storm unprepared.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Beaverhead, Lemhi Highlands; Big Hole Mountains; Centennial Mountains, Island Park
